predicate.note: Frames file for 'libel' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: tell lies about someone in print

example.name: the one example
example.text: But the panel dismissed the magazine's contention that it hadn't libeled Mrs. Sutcliffe when it accused her of trying to sell her story to capitalize on the notoriety of her husband.
example.arg: when it accused her of trying to sell her story to capitalize on the notoriety of her husband

roleset.note: Slander is when you tell lies about someone vocally.
